Class Submission

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.submissionMgt.Submission
public class Submission extends Object
Represents a student's submission for a programming assignment. This class holds details about the submission, such as the student's information, the submission path, status, and the results of any associated tests.

  • Constructor Details

    • Submission

      public Submission(String submissionPath)
      Constructor to initialize the submission with a given path. This constructor also processes and sets the submission details based on the file name.
      Parameters:
      submissionPath - the file path of the submission to be processed

    • getTestResults

      public HashMap<String,HashMap<String,String>> getTestResults()
      Gets the test results for the submission. The results are stored in a nested HashMap where the first key is the test class name and the second key is the test name, with the value being the test result.
      Returns:
      the test results of the submission

    • validateSubmissionNamingConvention

      public boolean validateSubmissionNamingConvention(String firstName, String lastName, String submissionId)
      Validates the naming convention of the submission based on the student's first name, last name, and submission ID. The naming convention must consist of the first name, last name, and a numeric submission ID.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the student
      lastName - the last name of the student
      submissionId - the submission ID to validate
      Returns:
      true if the naming convention is valid, otherwise false

    • extractFileNameWithoutExtension

      public String extractFileNameWithoutExtension(String filePath)
      Extracts the file name without the extension from a given file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path to extract the name from
      Returns:
      the file name without the extension

    • splitSetSubmissionDetails

      public void splitSetSubmissionDetails(String submissionString)
      Splits the submission details from the file name and sets the relevant submission information. The expected naming convention is "firstName_lastName_submissionId.ext", where: - firstName: the student's first name - lastName: the student's last name - submissionId: the unique submission ID (numeric) If the naming convention is invalid, the status is set to "INVALID" and an error message is provided.
      Parameters:
      submissionString - the file path or file name representing the submission
